snippet: Jurors failed to break an impasse in the case of a police officer who slammed an Indian man to the ground.
abstract: Federal District Court judge declares mistrial in the case of Alabama Police Officer Eric Parker, who was brought in on civil rights violation charge for slamming Sureshbhai Patel to ground and causing serious injuries.
lead_paragraph: Jurors failed to break an impasse in the case of a police officer who slammed an Indian man to the ground.

headline.main: Alabama: Mistrial for Officer Who Tackled Indian Man
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Mistrial for Officer Who Tackled Indian Man
